name: FPSCharTest (New input system)
description:
A small fast-paced version of an FPS type character using Unity's new input system. Likely to be used in future projects.

Controller support included. (Very satisfying)

(PS5 controller)

  • Left Stick - Locomotion
  • Right stick - Look around
  • X - Jump/Double jump
  • Triangle - Dash
  • L3 - Sprint
  • R3 - Crouch

(Keyboard + Mouse controls)

  • WASD - Locomotion
  • Space - Jump/Double jump
  • Left SHIFT - Sprint
  • Left CTRL - Crouch
  • Left ALT - Dash
